Class MovingActor

java.lang.Object
  greenfoot.Actor
      MovingActor

public abstract class MovingActor
extends greenfoot.Actor

An abstract class, implementing the basic needs for a moving actor such as movement and rotation of icon.

Version:
25/09/2008
Author:
Jakob Funder

Constructor Detail

MovingActor

public MovingActor()
Constructor for the MovingActor class. Sets the heading to (1,0) and speed = 2;

MovingActor

public MovingActor(Vector v,
                   double speed)
Constructor for the MovingActor class.

Parameters:
v - the initial heading of the MovingActor.
speed - the initial speed of the MovingActor.
Method Detail

act

public void act()
Acting method called by greenfoot. First we adjust the velocity using the forces that effect the MovingActor, then we rotate the image of the MovingActor towards the heading and lastly we move the MovingActor.

Overrides:
act in class greenfoot.Actor

addedToWorld

protected final void addedToWorld(greenfoot.World world)
This method is called when the MovingActor is first added to the world. We need to save the current position as double to handle subpixel movement.

Overrides:
addedToWorld in class greenfoot.Actor
